definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
lit. both sleeves flowing in the breeze (idiom); having clean hands/uncorrupted/unsoiled by corrupt practices
lit. cool breeze and bright moon (idiom)/fig. peaceful and clear night/(allusively) living a solitary and quiet life
see 清風明月|清风明月[qing1 feng1 ming2 yue4]

sentences.english: Here, cooling with wind, shadowing with greenery.
sentences.chinese: 这里，清风送爽，绿意更浓。

sentences.english: That if have if have no of optional like qingfengdian essentially unimportant matters wind.
sentences.chinese: 那种若有若无的随意就像一阵清风无关痛痒的刮过。

sentences.english: With mountain winds, and babbling springs.
sentences.chinese: 和山间的清风与淙淙流泉。

sentences.english: I take a deep inhale, depressed at the freshness.
sentences.chinese: 但我还得深吸一口清风，只得暂存清新的爱语。

sentences.english: Why should you turn over the pages of my book?
sentences.chinese: 清风不识字，何必乱翻书？

sentences.english: When she is falling into the pool, a breeze holds her up.
sentences.chinese: 在她掉入水塘时，一阵清风将她盈盈托住。

sentences.english: After 15 min, summit of hill last agreeable breeze shine moon, again neither person.
sentences.chinese: 一刻钟过后，山顶上清风明月，再无一人。

sentences.english: Like a breeze from the top of the mountain, creating a yonghe elegant breath.
sentences.chinese: 仿佛来自山顶的一缕清风，创造出永和优雅的气息。

sentences.english: Look at the Red, you Jingsi Music, dancing cool breeze.
sentences.chinese: 看红尘，你是青丝飘飘，舞动清风。

sentences.english: I won't forsake the wind and the moon.
sentences.chinese: 我不愿放弃清风和明月。

sentences.english: A gentle breeze whistles through the pine forest and bamboo groves.
sentences.chinese: 清风徐来，松涛竹籁，美景令人陶醉。

sentences.english: The light wind strewed it with beautiful shadows of clouds and trees.
sentences.chinese: 清风在其上筛落下云朵和树木的美丽的影子。

sentences.english: A cool breeze came in through the window.

sentences.chinese: 某日下午，阳光明媚，清风拂面。

sentences.english: Keanu's name is Hawaiian and it means " cool breeze over the mountains".
sentences.chinese: 基努的名字是厦威夷语，意思是“来自山谷的清风”。

sentences.english: So I decided to have clean hands to start with small things.
sentences.chinese: 于是两袖清风的我决定从小事情做起。

definition: bright moon/refers to 夜明珠, a legendary pearl that can glow in the dark/CL:輪|轮[lun2]
see 清風明月|清风明月[qing1 feng1 ming2 yue4]
Baiyun district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou/Baiyun district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
morning dew/fig. precarious brevity of human life/ephemeral
